element.name: TfrmExplorer.PopulateIndex
element.short: Populate Index will fill the index-grid with all names from every individual, their birth and death-dates if there are any

element.name: TfrmExplorer.AddNameToExplorer
element.short: Will put a single name to the index-grid of the explorer.

element.name: TfrmExplorer.UpdateIndexDates
element.short: ... will update the dates of a specific entry of the index

element.name: TfrmExplorer.FormClose
element.short: on close the position of the form and the index-grid will be saved

element.name: TfrmExplorer.FormShow
element.short: on show the translation of the grid-title and the menu is loaded, then the position of the form and the position of the grid-columns id restored, the the index is filled and at last the individual is searchtd and displayed
